1072569394616852480.text: “We think access to crypto globally is still largely an unsolved problem. In emerging markets, it’s still quite difficult for people to get their first bitcoin or crypto. We’re really focused on expanding the number of people and countries that have easy onramps to crypto."

1072569393673068544.text: “In order to have easy onramps into crypto, you still need strong partnerships with traditional financial institutions. We realize from a practical standpoint that’s how you actually get more people access to cryptocurrency.”

1004485803655847937.text: Just as Coinbase has served as the on-ramp for many investors into the crypto space, we see our new licenses as another step toward bridging the gap between traditional finance and an open financial system for the world.

1004485408833470464.text: This step will also set Coinbase on a path to offer services like crypto-securities trading, margin and over-the-counter (OTC) trading, and new market data products.

1004485310732853248.text: Securing these licenses will bring us a step closer to our goal, which is to be the most trusted way for our customers to buy, sell, and use many different types of crypto assets.

1004484944708530176.text: If approved, Coinbase will be capable of offering blockchain-based securities, under the oversight of the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA).

1004484809316446208.text: Today we’re excited to announce that we’re on track to become a US-regulated blockchain securities trading venue. 995108504028377088.text: We are in the early days of our mission and there is still so much to do. Thank you to everyone who has supported our mission along the way. Special thanks to our more than  20MM customers for inspiring us every day.

995108502879092738.text: The next phase brings real use cases that enable people to use, earn and transact with products like @CommerceCB, @toshi and @earndotcom. We call this the utility phase.

995108501042053120.text: Over the past six years, we built a bridge between fiat and crypto by creating the easiest, most secure way for anyone to buy and sell crypto. We call this the investment phase.

995108499985022980.text: We think this is the highest leverage way to bring about more economic freedom, innovation, efficiency and equality of opportunity in the world.

995108498789752832.text: Mission statements can be corny, but we really believe in our goal: to create a more open financial system that is accessible to anyone with an internet connection. A more open financial system that is not controlled by any one country or company, like the internet itself.

995108495862022146.text: Today is Coinbase’s sixth anniversary. We’re celebrating six incredible years working toward our mission to help create a more open financial system for the world! pic.twitter.com/CSaqnqY5QU

964318109933879297.text: 4/ If you have been affected by any erroneous charges associated with purchases of digital currency with credit and debit cards, we are encouraging customers to contact their bank or card issuer and ask about the charges. In addition, please contact Coinbase support.

964317651387351040.text: 3/ Coinbase is actively working with major card networks to create a new MCC for digital currency purchases. For the benefit of consumers, we hope that this will not have additional "cash advance" fees. Cards provide wider access to digital currency than just bank accounts.

964316806411268096.text: 2/ Over the last few months, large banks and card issuers requested that card networks change the MCC for purchases of digital currency. Visa changed the MCC for digital currency purchases to a code that allows large banks and card issuers to charge consumers additional fees.

964316171934711808.text: 1/ We have determined that the erroneous credit and debit charges are the result of Visa reversing and recharging transactions. This was not done by Coinbase. We are working with Visa to ensure all affected customers are reimbursed.

964263187435499520.text: 4/ If you suspect you were incorrectly charged, please contact your bank or card issuer and ask about the charges. After that, please contact Coinbase support.

964250065442258944.text: 3/ If you believe you were affected by this issue, please contact support at http://support.coinbase.com . We will be reviewing all card transactions from the last few weeks to ensure any customers affected are notified. We will post on Twitter and our blog with further updates.

964249378805264386.text: 2/ We have identified a solution and any future purchases will not be affected by this issue. We will ensure any customer affected by this issue is fully refunded for any incorrect charge. We expect this to happen for customers automatically through their bank.

964248915695448064.text: 1/ We're investigating an issue where some customers recently were charged incorrectly for purchases of digital currency with credit and debit cards. This is related to the recent MCC code change by the card networks and card issuers charging additional fees.
